sentences.sentence: 哎呀，没有盐了，老王你跑一趟买一包盐来。
sentences.pinyin: Āiyā, méiyǒu yán le, Lǎo Wáng nǐ pǎo yī tàng mǎi yī bāo yán lái.
sentences.korean: 아이고, 소금이 떨어졌네. 왕 씨, 한 번 다녀와서 소금 한 포 사다 줘.
sentences.english: Oh dear, we're out of salt. Old Wang, please make a trip to buy a pack of salt.

sentences.sentence: 好，我买了，麻烦您给包一下吧。
sentences.pinyin: Hǎo, wǒ mǎi le, máfan nín gěi bāo yīxià ba.
sentences.korean: 좋아, 살게요. 번거롭겠지만 포장 좀 해주세요.
sentences.english: Okay, I'll buy it. Please wrap it up for me.

sentences.sentence: 我只见过安娜一次。
sentences.pinyin: Wǒ zhǐ jiàn guò Ānnà yī cì.
sentences.korean: 나는 안나를 단 한 번만 본 적이 있다.
sentences.english: I have only met Anna once.

sentences.sentence: 请你解释一下这个词的意思。
sentences.pinyin: Qǐng nǐ jiěshì yīxià zhège cí de yìsi.
sentences.korean: 이 단어의 뜻을 좀 설명해 주세요.
sentences.english: Please explain the meaning of this word.

sentences.sentence: 那儿交通不方便，回去一趟挺不容易的。
sentences.pinyin: Nàr jiāotōng bù fāngbiàn, huíqù yī tàng tǐng bù róngyì de.
sentences.korean: 그곳은 교통이 불편해서 한 번 다녀오기가 꽤 쉽지 않아.
sentences.english: The transportation there is inconvenient, going back for a trip is quite difficult.

sentences.sentence: 本店今天开业，欢迎朋友们光临。
sentences.pinyin: Běn diàn jīntiān kāiyè, huānyíng péngyǒumen guānglín.
sentences.korean: 저희 가게가 오늘 개업합니다. 친구들의 방문을 환영합니다.
sentences.english: Our store opens today, welcome friends to visit.

meaning_and_reading: 벗 붕, 벗 우, 무리 문

sentences.sentence: 这几年北京的旅游业发展得很快。
sentences.pinyin: Zhè jǐ nián Běijīng de lǚyóuyè fāzhǎn de hěn kuài.
sentences.korean: 최근 몇 년간 베이징의 관광업이 매우 빠르게 발전했다.
sentences.english: Beijing's tourism industry has developed very rapidly in recent years.

meaning_and_reading: 이 저, 몇 기, 해 년
여행 여, 놀 유, 업 업

sentences.sentence: 有100个毕业生报名参加这次考试，竞争得很厉害。
sentences.pinyin: Yǒu yībǎi gè bìyèshēng bàomíng cānjiā zhè cì kǎoshì, jìngzhēng de hěn lìhai.
sentences.korean: 100명의 졸업생이 이번 시험에 응시 신청을 했는데, 경쟁이 매우 치열하다.
sentences.english: 100 graduates applied for this exam, the competition is very fierce.

meaning_and_reading: 필할 필, 업 업, 날 생

sentences.sentence: 老王从来不抽高档烟。
sentences.pinyin: Lǎo Wáng cónglái bù chōu gāodàng yān.
sentences.korean: 왕 씨는 고급 담배를 전혀 피우지 않는다.
sentences.english: Old Wang never smokes high-end cigarettes.

sentences.sentence: 爱珍刚才还又说又笑呢，这会儿怎么哭起来了？
sentences.pinyin: Àizhēn gāngcái hái yòu shuō yòu xiào ne, zhèhuìr zěnme kū qǐlái le?
sentences.korean: 애진이가 방금까지도 말하고 웃고 있었는데, 지금은 왜 울기 시작했지?
sentences.english: Aizhen was just talking and laughing, why did she start crying now?

meaning_and_reading: 이 저, 모일 회, 아들 아

sentences.sentence: 师傅，您看看我的手表出什么毛病了，怎么不走了？
sentences.pinyin: Shīfu, nín kànkan wǒ de shǒubiǎo chū shénme máobìng le, zěnme bù zǒu le?
sentences.korean: 사부님, 제 손목시계에 무슨 문제가 생겼는지 좀 봐주세요. 왜 멈췄을까요?
sentences.english: Master, please take a look at my watch to see what's wrong with it. Why did it stop working?

sentences.sentence: 这辆车两个轮胎都漏气了，该换了。
sentences.pinyin: Zhè liàng chē liǎng gè lúntāi dōu lòuqì le, gāi huàn le.
sentences.korean: 이 차는 타이어 두 개가 모두 바람이 빠졌으니, 교체해야 한다.
sentences.english: This car has two flat tires, they should be replaced.

sentences.sentence: 你的裙子是真丝的吧？真漂亮。
sentences.pinyin: Nǐ de qúnzi shì zhēnsī de ba? Zhēn piàoliang.
sentences.korean: 당신 치마는 실크로 만든 거죠? 정말 예쁘네요.
sentences.english: Your skirt is made of silk, right? It's really beautiful.

sentences.sentence: 哎呀，没有盐了，老王你跑一趟买一包盐来。
sentences.pinyin: Āiyā, méiyǒu yán le, Lǎo Wáng nǐ pǎo yī tàng mǎi yī bāo yán lái.
sentences.korean: 아이고, 소금이 떨어졌네. 왕 씨, 한 번 다녀와서 소금 한 포 사다 줘.
sentences.english: Oh dear, we're out of salt. Old Wang, please make a trip to buy a pack of salt.

sentences.sentence: 好，我买了，麻烦您给包一下吧。
sentences.pinyin: Hǎo, wǒ mǎi le, máfan nín gěi bāo yīxià ba.
sentences.korean: 좋아, 살게요. 번거롭겠지만 포장 좀 해주세요.
sentences.english: Okay, I'll buy it. Please wrap it up for me.

sentences.sentence: 我只见过安娜一次。
sentences.pinyin: Wǒ zhǐ jiàn guò Ānnà yī cì.
sentences.korean: 나는 안나를 단 한 번만 본 적이 있다.
sentences.english: I have only met Anna once.

sentences.sentence: 请你解释一下这个词的意思。
sentences.pinyin: Qǐng nǐ jiěshì yīxià zhège cí de yìsi.
sentences.korean: 이 단어의 뜻을 좀 설명해 주세요.
sentences.english: Please explain the meaning of this word.

sentences.pinyin: Nàr jiāotōng bù fāngbiàn, huíqù yī tàng tǐng bù róngyì de.
sentences.korean: 그곳은 교통이 불편해서 한 번 다녀오기가 꽤 쉽지 않아.
sentences.english: The transportation there is inconvenient, going back for a trip is quite difficult.

sentences.sentence: 本店今天开业，欢迎朋友们光临。
sentences.pinyin: Běn diàn jīntiān kāiyè, huānyíng péngyǒumen guānglín.
sentences.korean: 저희 가게가 오늘 개업합니다. 친구들의 방문을 환영합니다.
sentences.english: Our store opens today, welcome friends to visit.

meaning_and_reading: 친할 친, 벗 구, 무리 들

sentences.sentence: 这几年北京的旅游业发展得很快。
sentences.pinyin: Zhè jǐ nián Běijīng de lǚyóuyè fāzhǎn de hěn kuài.
sentences.korean: 최근 몇 년간 베이징의 관광업이 매우 빠르게 발전했다.
sentences.english: Beijing's tourism industry has developed very rapidly in recent years.

sentences.korean: 100명의 졸업생이 이번 시험에 응시 신청을 했는데, 경쟁이 매우 치열하다.
sentences.english: 100 graduates applied for this exam, the competition is very fierce.

sentences.pinyin: Lǎo Wáng cónglái bù chōu gāodàng yān.

sentences.english: Aizhen was just talking and laughing, why did she start crying now?

sentences.sentence: 师傅，您看看我的手表出什么毛病了，怎么不走了？
sentences.pinyin: Shīfu, nín kànkan wǒ de shǒubiǎo chū shénme máobìng le, zěnme bù zǒu le?
sentences.korean: 사부님, 제 손목시계에 무슨 문제가 생겼는지 좀 봐주세요. 왜 멈췄을까요?
sentences.english: Master, please take a look at my watch to see what's wrong with it. Why did it stop working?

sentences.sentence: 这辆车两个轮胎都漏气了，该换了。
sentences.pinyin: Zhè liàng chē liǎng gè lúntāi dōu lòuqì le, gāi huàn le.
sentences.korean: 이 차는 타이어 두 개가 모두 바람이 빠졌으니, 교체해야 한다.
sentences.english: This car has two flat tires, they should be replaced.

sentences.sentence: 你的裙子是真丝的吧？真漂亮。
sentences.pinyin: Nǐ de qúnzi shì zhēnsī de ba? Zhēn piàoliang.
sentences.korean: 당신 치마는 실크로 만든 거죠? 정말 예쁘네요.
sentences.english: Your skirt is made of silk, right? It's really beautiful.

sentences.sentence: 路口
sentences.pinyin: lùkǒu
sentences.korean: 길목, 교차로 입구
sentences.english: intersection, road junction

examples.english: Waiting for the red light at the intersection.

sentences.sentence: 十字路口
sentences.pinyin: shízì lùkǒu
sentences.korean: 네거리, 사거리
sentences.english: crossroads, four-way intersection

sentences.sentence: 三岔路口
sentences.pinyin: sān chà lùkǒu
sentences.korean: 삼거리
sentences.english: three-way intersection

sentences.sentence: 丁字路口
sentences.pinyin: dīngzì lùkǒu
sentences.korean: T자 교차로
sentences.english: T-junction

sentences.sentence: 讲价
sentences.pinyin: jiǎng jià
sentences.korean: 값을 교섭하다, 값을 흥정하다
sentences.english: bargain, negotiate price

examples.pinyin: Zài shìchǎng shang kěyǐ jiǎng jià.
examples.english: You can bargain in the market.

sentences.sentence: 讨价还价
sentences.pinyin: tǎo jià huán jià
sentences.korean: 흥정
sentences.english: haggle, bargain back and forth

sentences.sentence: 折扣
sentences.pinyin: zhékòu
sentences.korean: 할인
sentences.english: discount

sentences.sentence: 打折扣
sentences.pinyin: dǎ zhékòu
sentences.korean: 디스카운트하다
sentences.english: give a discount

sentences.sentence: 挨宰
sentences.pinyin: ái zǎi
sentences.korean: 속아 넘어가다, 바가지를 씌우다
sentences.english: be ripped off, be overcharged

sentences.sentence: 打折
sentences.pinyin: dǎzhé
sentences.korean: 할인해주다
sentences.english: give discount

sentences.sentence: 减价
sentences.pinyin: jiǎn jià
sentences.korean: 가격할인
sentences.english: reduce price

sentences.sentence: 打八折
sentences.pinyin: dǎ bā zhé
sentences.korean: 20% 할인
sentences.english: 20% discount (80% of original price)

sentences.sentence: 减价百分之二十
sentences.pinyin: jiǎn jià bǎifēnzhī èrshí
sentences.korean: 20% 가격 할인
sentences.english: 20% price reduction

sentences.sentence: 听说你是个电脑迷，是真的吗？
sentences.pinyin: Tīngshuō nǐ shì ge diànnǎo mí, shì zhēnde ma?
sentences.korean: 네가 컴퓨터 매니아라고 들었는데, 정말이야?
sentences.english: I heard you're a computer enthusiast. Is that true?

meaning_and_reading: 번개 전, 뇌 뇌, 미혹할 미

sentences.sentence: 没错，我从小就特别喜欢玩儿电脑。
sentences.pinyin: Méicuò, wǒ cóngxiǎo jiù tèbié xǐhuan wánr diànnǎo.
sentences.korean: 맞아, 나는 어릴 때부터 컴퓨터 하는 걸 특별히 좋아했어.
sentences.english: That's right, I've especially liked playing with computers since I was young.

sentences.sentence: 对了，我想买中文软件，你说去哪儿买好？
sentences.pinyin: Duìle, wǒ xiǎng mǎi zhōngwén ruǎnjiàn, nǐ shuō qù nǎr mǎi hǎo?
sentences.korean: 그런데, 나는 중국어 소프트웨어를 사고 싶은데, 어디서 사는 게 좋을까?
sentences.english: By the way, I want to buy Chinese software. Where do you think would be good to buy it?

sentences.sentence: 离这儿不远有个叫中关村的地方，那儿有不少电子市场，你可以去那儿逛逛。
sentences.pinyin: Lí zhèr bù yuǎn yǒu ge jiào Zhōngguāncūn de dìfang, nàr yǒu bù shǎo diànzǐ shìchǎng, nǐ kěyǐ qù nàr guàngguang.
sentences.korean: 여기서 멀지 않은 곳에 중관촌이라는 곳이 있어, 거기에 전자시장이 꽤 많아, 거기 가서 구경해봐.
sentences.english: There's a place called Zhongguancun not far from here. There are quite a few electronics markets there. You can go there and look around.

meaning_and_reading: 가운데 중, 관계할 관, 마을 촌

sentences.sentence: 中关村在哪儿，去那儿怎么走？
sentences.pinyin: Zhōngguāncūn zài nǎr, qù nàr zěnme zǒu?
sentences.korean: 중관촌이 어디에 있어, 거기 어떻게 가?
sentences.english: Where is Zhongguancun? How do we get there?

sentences.sentence: 要不，这样吧，我下午正好要去买个鼠标，我们一起骑车去吧。
sentences.pinyin: Yàobù, zhèyàng ba, wǒ xiàwǔ zhènghǎo yào qù mǎi ge shǔbiāo, wǒmen yīqǐ qí chē qù ba.
sentences.korean: 아니면, 이렇게 하자, 나는 오후에 마침 마우스를 사러 가야 하는데, 우리 함께 자전거 타고 가자.
sentences.english: Or rather, let's do this: I happen to need to buy a mouse this afternoon, so let's ride bikes there together.

sentences.sentence: 到前边的路口往右拐，再骑100多米就到了。
sentences.pinyin: Dào qiánbian de lùkǒu wǎng yòu guǎi, zài qí yībǎi duō mǐ jiù dào le.
sentences.korean: 앞쪽 길목에서 오른쪽으로 돌아서, 100미터 정도 더 가면 도착이야.
sentences.english: Turn right at the intersection ahead, then ride about 100 more meters and you'll arrive.

sentences.sentence: "北京现代电子市场"。这儿真大呀！
sentences.pinyin: "Běijīng xiàndài diànzǐ shìchǎng". Zhèr zhēn dà ya!
sentences.korean: "베이징현대전자시장"이구나. 여기 정말 크다!
sentences.english: "Beijing Modern Electronics Market." This place is really big!

sentences.sentence: 这个市场里既有硬件，又有软件。
sentences.pinyin: Zhège shìchǎng lǐ jì yǒu yìngjiàn, yòu yǒu ruǎnjiàn.
sentences.korean: 이 시장에는 하드웨어도 있고, 소프트웨어도 있어.
sentences.english: This market has both hardware and software.

examples.english: He is both smart and diligent.

sentences.sentence: 咱们先到二层去看看软件吧。
sentences.pinyin: Zánmen xiān dào èr céng qù kànkan ruǎnjiàn ba.
sentences.korean: 우리 먼저 2층에 가서 소프트웨어를 봐보자.
sentences.english: Let's first go to the second floor to look at software.

sentences.sentence: 好，等一会儿我想请你帮我跟他们讲价，可以吗？
sentences.pinyin: Hǎo, děng yīhuìr wǒ xiǎng qǐng nǐ bāng wǒ gēn tāmen jiǎng jià, kěyǐ ma?
sentences.korean: 좋아, 잠깐 후에 네가 나 대신 그들과 값을 흥정해줄 수 있을까?
sentences.english: Good. In a little while, could you please help me bargain with them?

meaning_and_reading: 기다릴 등, 한 일, 잠깐 회
